Export.Routine:
WWWSEAR #include COMSYS ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Search form. If using COMView jump out of this routine. ;SUCHFUNKTION ; ; History: ; 06-Jun-2014 shobby CORE-385.13: Assume that we will always be using COMView ; 05-Nov-2007 shobby SRBR014748: Use standard routine to validate passwords. ; 12-Jun-2007 GRF SR15543: Naked references; doco; quits ; 08-Dec-2006 PO SR15276: Changed name of EventBroker to JSLibraries ; 2-Jun-2006 JW SR14697: Always use eventbrokeren1.js ; 07-Jul-2005 shobby SR12892: WWW1263 is no longer shared. ; 30-May-2005 RPW SR12056: Attempt at Performance Increase. Also note ; COMViewSetup.OBJ exists. ; 22-Mar-2005 Paul K SR11912: Changed to check for existance of COMViewSetup ; routine before calling COMView ; 11.08.1997 DT (C) BY DITMAR TYBUSSEK ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW (%request,%session,%KEY,%,%ZCS,%CGIEVAR,YTIMEFORM) SET $ZTRAP="^WWWERROR" DO ^WWWVAR ;IF ($$EXIST^%R("COMViewSetup.OBJ",$GET(YUCI)))&&($PIECE($GET(^COMViewConfig(0,YM,1)),Y,9)=1)&&('$get(YTIMEFORM)) { IF '$get(YTIMEFORM) { ;($PIECE($GET(^COMViewConfig(0,YM,1)),Y,9)=1)&&('$get(YTIMEFORM)) { ;CORE-385.13 set YPARA=$zconvert($listbuild(YFORM,"",$get(YFKEY)),"o","URL") ; SR11661 do RedirectForm^COMUtilForm("COMViewSearch","",YFORM_",",YPARA,YSEITE) quit } ;CORE-385.13 ********* All the Code below can be removed as we will always be using COMView ;Berechtigung ;Users Access IF '$DATA(^WWW013(0,YBED)) DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(5)) QUIT ;KEINE BERECHTIGUNG ;no ;IF $$^WWWPWDCHECK($PIECE(^WWW013(0,YBED,1),Y,2))'=YPWD DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(5)) QUIT ;IF $$^WWWUPER($$^WWWPWDCHECK($PIECE(^WWW013(0,YBED,1),Y,2)))'=$$^WWWUPER(YPWD) DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(5)) QUIT ;BEC;21.07.04;26124 ; BR014748 IF $zconvert($$^WWWPWDCHECK($PIECE(^WWW013(0,YBED,1),Y,2)),"U")'=$zconvert(YPWD,"U") DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(5)) QUIT ;BEC;21.07.04;26124 IF '$$CHECK^WWWPWDCHECK($PIECE(^WWW013(0,YBED,1),Y,2),YPWD) DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(5)) QUIT ;BEC;21.07.04;26124 SET YVOR = ^WWW013(0,YBED,1) SET YBER = $PIECE(YVOR,Y,3) SET YMOD = $PIECE(YVOR,Y,4) IF YUSER'="" DO . SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,5) = "" ; $$$WWWUSERHTMLStarted . SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,6) = "" . SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,9) = "" . SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,10) = "" ;layout DO ^WWWFORMX ;VORGABEN SET YSUCH1="" IF YSUCH="" SET YSUCH=$ORDER(^WWW123(0,YFORM,"")) IF YSUCH'="" IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YSUCH,1)),Y,13)'="" IF $ORDER(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YSUCH))'="" SET YSUCH=$ORDER(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YSUCH)) IF YSUCH'="" IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YSUCH,1)),Y,13)'="" IF $ORDER(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YSUCH))'="" SET YSUCH=$ORDER(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YSUCH)) IF YSUCH'="" SET YSUCH1=$GET(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YSUCH,1)) IF $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,4)'="" DO ;VON DIETMAR WACH ;open-eyed . IF YKEY="" SET YKEY=$GET(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"P",1)) . FOR %I=1:1:$LENGTH($PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,4),",") IF $PIECE(YSUCH1,",",%I)'="" SET YFKEY=$PIECE(YKEY,",",+$PIECE($PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,4),",",%I))_"," . IF $EXTRACT(YFKEY,$LENGTH(YFKEY))="," SET YFKEY=$EXTRACT(YFKEY,1,($LENGTH(YFKEY)-1)) IF YFKEY="," SET YFKEY="" SET YDATEI=$PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,2) IF YDATEI="" SET YDATEI=$PIECE($GET(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)),Y,11) IF YDATEI="" DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(140)) QUIT ;KEINE DATEI ;no data file IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW001(0,YDATEI,1)),Y,8)=5 DO ;DATEI FUER PROGRAMME ;data file . DO ^WWWROUTINELIST SET YKOPF=$PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,1) IF YKOPF="" SET YKOPF=$PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,2) IF YKOPF'="" SET YKOPF=$$^WWWTEXT(YKOPF) ;bec;12.06.03;23787;Text tiltleleiste IF YKOPF="" IF YNAME="" DO . IF $DATA(^WWW0011(0,YDATEI,SPRACHE,1)) SET YNAME=$PIECE(^WWW0011(0,YDATEI,SPRACHE,1),Y,1) QUIT ; SR15543 Naked Ref . SET YNAME=$PIECE($GET(^WWW001(0,YDATEI,1)),Y,1) IF YKOPF="" SET YKOPF=YNAME IF YNAME="" SET YNAME=YKOPF ;NUR ANZEIGE DER ZEITABHÄNIGEN DATEN ;only Show the SET YTIMEFORM=+$GET(%(YQUERY,"YTIMEFORM")) IF YTIMEFORM=1 DO . SET YMAXKEY=$ORDER(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,""),-1) . IF +YMAXKEY=0 SET YMAXKEY=1 . SET YFKEY=$PIECE($GET(FFKEY),",",1,YMAXKEY) SET YREFR="" IF $GET(YOPEN)="SAVESEAR" SET YREFR=600 ;FIS;SONST CSP ERROR DO ^WWWSTART($$^WWWTEXT(148)_" "_$$^WWWUML(YKOPF),,YREFR) IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW012(0,YM,1)),Y,31)'=7 do JSLibraries^WWWFORM8() // SR14697 // SR15276 IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW012(0,YM,1)),Y,31)=7 DO ^WWWFORM8 ;JAVASCRIPT MENUE IF $GET(%(YQUERY,"YBUTTON"))="YSEARBIT" SET $PIECE(^WWW1263(YM,YFORM,YBED,1),Y,2)=1 ;BITSUCHE IF $GET(%(YQUERY,"YBUTTON"))="YSEARDFLT" SET $PIECE(^WWW1263(YM,YFORM,YBED,1),Y,2)=0 ;NORMALSUCHE SET YBITSEARCH=0 ;VORGABE SUCHE (NORMAL/BITSUCHE) ;default search SET YSEARBIT=0 ;BITSUCHE MÖGLICH;FIS;19.12.03 ;potential IF $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,22)=1 IF YDATEI'="" IF $DATA(^WWW001B(0,YDATEI)) IF $DATA(@("^"_YDATEI_"b")) SET YSEARBIT=1 ;TYBD;11,09,2003 ;IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW1263(YM,YFORM,YBED,1)),Y,2)="" SET $PIECE(^(1),Y,2)=+YSEARBIT ;FIS;19.12.03;USER SUCHVORGABE SET YBITSEARCH=$PIECE($GET(^WWW1263(YM,YFORM,YBED,1)),Y,2) ;FIS;19.12.03;USER SUCHVORGABE IF YBITSEARCH="" SET YBITSEARCH=+YSEARBIT IF $GET(YTIMEFORM)=1 SET YBITSEARCH=0 ;TYBD;NORMALE SUCHE BEI VORERFASSUNG; 3,11,2003 ;SET YBITSEARCH=0 ;AUSGESCHALTET.TYBD;28,11,2003 ;----------- NORMALE SUCHE ------------------ IF $GET(YBITSEARCH)'=1 DO . DO ^WWWBODY(3,"NOPRINT") ;OHNE AUS YAUSWAHL ;without out of . ; . SET YFIXHEADER=0 . ; . IF $GET(YFIXHEADER)'=1 DO ^WWWUP(0) ;SETZEN ANKER ;typeset armature . ;I $P(YVOR,Y,10)=1 W "
" . ;D ^WWWUP(0) . ;D ^WWWKOPF($$^WWWTEXT(148)_" ("_YNAME_")") . ;I $P(YVOR,Y,10)=1 W "
" . ; . IF YORIENT="" SET YORIENT=+$PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,9) . IF $GET(YSORT)="" IF $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,3)'="" SET YSORT=+$PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,3) . IF $GET(YSORT)="" SET YSORT=+$PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,7) . ; . IF $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,17)'="" DO ;FESTER SORTKEY . . SET YSAUSW=$PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,17) . . IF $EXTRACT(YSAUSW)="@" DO . . . IF $EXTRACT(YSAUSW,2)'="$" SET YSAUSW=$GET(@($EXTRACT($PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,17),2,99))) QUIT . . . NEW YSAUSW1 . . . SET YSAUSW1="S YSAUSW="_$EXTRACT($PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,17),2,99) . . . XECUTE YSAUSW1 . ; . IF $GET(YFIXHEADER)=1 DO . . WRITE "" . . DO ^WWWFRAME(1) . ; . ;ENDE ;termination . IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,9)=""!($PIECE(YVOR,Y,21)="1") WRITE "
"
	. IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,8)=1 WRITE ""
	. ;I $P(YVOR,Y,10)=1 W "
"
	. ;DO ^WWWFRAME(0)
	. ;
	. ;
	. IF $GET(YFIXHEADER)=1 DO
	. . WRITE "
" DO ^WWWFRAME(1) . ;I $P(YVOR,Y,10)=1 W "" . IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,8)=1 WRITE "" . IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,9)=""!($PIECE(YVOR,Y,21)="1") WRITE "" . WRITE "" . ; . IF $GET(YFIXHEADER)'=1 DO ^WWWUP(1) . IF $GET(YFIXHEADER)=1 DO . . WRITE "" . . WRITE "
" . ; . DO ^WWWSEAR4 ;SELEKTIEREN DER DATEN ;the . DO ^WWWSEAR1 ;BUTTONS . ; . IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,13)=1 DO . . DO ^WWWFRAME(100) . . WRITE "
" . ; . DO ^WWWSEAR2 ;ANZEIGEN VORGABEN ;display . ; . IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,13)=1 DO . . WRITE "
" . . WRITE "
" . ; . DO ^WWWSEAR3 ;ANZEIGEN WERTE ;display . ; . ;DO ^WWWFRAME(1) . ;IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,13)=1 WRITE YCR,"
" ;----------- BITSEARCH ------------------ IF $GET(YBITSEARCH)=1 DO . DO ^WWWBODY(2,"NOPRINT") . DO ^WWWUP(0) . DO ^WWWSEARBIT . DO ^WWWUP(1) DO ^WWWSTOP ;I YHYPER'=1 DO KillAllObjects^%apiOBJ() QUIT
